actions.name: CreateAccountAssociationInvitation
actions.description: Grants permission to request association of an account with a given domain

actions.name: CreateDataSource
actions.description: Grants permission to create Amazon DataZone data sources used for publishing and subscribing to data

actions.name: CreateEnvironment
actions.description: Grants permission to provision a root-domain which is a top level entity that contains other Amazon DataZone resources

actions.name: DeleteDataSource
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a data source

actions.name: DeleteEnvironment
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a provisioned root-domain

actions.name: DissociateAccount
actions.description: Grants permission to disassociate an account with a given domain

actions.name: GetAssociatedDomain
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about any associated domain in the associated account

actions.name: GetDataSourceByEnvironment
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve any data source under any domain for a given root-domain

actions.name: GetDomain
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about any domain in the account

actions.name: GetEnvironment
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about a root-domain

actions.name: GetMetadataCollector
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve a publishing job

actions.name: GetUserPortalLoginAuthCode
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve credentials to log into Amazon DataZone data portal from AWS management console

actions.name: ListAccountAssociationInvitations
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve all account-association invitations for a given associated account

actions.name: ListAllAssociatedAccountsForEnvironment
actions.description: Grants permission to list all associated accounts under the given root-domain, including accounts associated to its sub-domains

actions.name: ListAssociatedEnvironments
actions.description: Grants permission to lists all the associated domains for a given associated account

actions.name: ListDataSources
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve all data sources under any domain in the associated account

actions.name: ListDataSourcesByEnvironment
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve all data sources under any domain for a given root-domain

actions.name: ListDomains
actions.description: Grants permission to list all the sub-domains for a given domain or a root-domain

actions.name: ListEnvironment
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve all root-domains

actions.name: ListMetadataCollectorRuns
actions.description: Grants permission to list all runs for a given publishing job through Amazon DataZone console for a data source

actions.name: ListMetadataCollectors
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve all publishing jobs

actions.name: ListProjects
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve all Amazon DataZone projects

actions.name: ListTagsForResource
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve all tags associated with a resource

actions.name: ReviewAccountAssociationInvitation
actions.description: Grants permission to accept or reject the pending association requests for the given account

actions.name: TagResource
actions.description: Grants permission to add or update tags to a resource

actions.name: UntagResource
actions.description: Grants permission to remove tags associated with a resource

actions.name: UpdateAccountAssociationDescription
actions.description: Grants permission to update the description of the account association of the given associated account and given domain

actions.name: UpdateDataSource
actions.description: Grants permission to update a data source

actions.name: UpdateEnvironment
actions.description: Grants permission to update information for a root-domain
